ggpubfigs has a set six themes to pick from. Three are for making publication ready figures and three are for presentation purposes:

**Publication ready themes**
* theme_grid()
* theme_simple()
* theme_grey()

**Presentation ready themes**
* theme_black()
* theme_blue()
* theme_red()


```{r}
library(ggpubfigs)
```

View 
```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Petal.Length, color=Species)) + geom_point() + labs(title="Iris") + theme_grid()
```
